meanings.definition: A dark-colored variety of sheepskin or lambskin used for clothing or trimming.
meanings.sent1: She bought a coat made of soft morkin to keep warm in winter.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer added a touch of morkin to the collar of the jacket.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten played with a scrap of morkin, thinking it was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The morkin trim on the dress made it look elegant and luxurious.
meanings.sent5: The morkin felt like a cloud against her skin, so cozy and comforting.

meanings.definition: A piece of fur or skin, especially that of a rabbit, used as trimming on garments.
meanings.sent1: The gloves were adorned with soft morkin around the cuffs.
meanings.sent2: She sewed a delicate piece of morkin onto the hem of her skirt.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy ran off with a strip of morkin, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: The morkin trim on the hat added a touch of elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: As she touched the morkin, she felt the softness and warmth it provided.
